data.diagram_xml:
<xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <block type="newApp" id="21" inline="false" deletable="false" x="0" y="0">
    <mutation formcount="2" factcount="2" forms=",Review Request,poi_review_form,Select Failure Reason,poi_reject_form" facts=",To-Be Selected,poi_listtobe_fact ,To-Be Approved,poi_gettobe_fact " factmap=",listMap,getMap"></mutation>
    <field name="PROCESSTYPES">["Approval","approval:1:54"]</field>
    <value name="FORM_1">
      <block type="Form" id="22">
        <field name="FORMS">Approve or Reject</field>
      </block>
    </value>
    <value name="FORM_2">
      <block type="Form" id="23">
        <field name="FORMS">Reject Reason</field>
      </block>
    </value>
    <value name="FACT_1">
      <block type="newFact" id="24" inline="false">
        <mutation inputcount="1" type="LIST Recs"></mutation>
        <field name="FACTS">SFDC Component</field>
        <field name="factTypes">LIST Recs</field>
        <value name="INPUT_0">
          <block type="text" id="25">
            <field name="TEXT">Opportunity</field>
          </block>
        </value>
      </block>
    </value>
    <value name="FACT_2">
      <block type="newFact" id="26" inline="false">
        <mutation inputcount="2" type="READ"></mutation>
        <field name="FACTS">SFDC Component</field>
        <field name="factTypes">READ</field>
        <value name="INPUT_0">
          <block type="variable" id="27">
            <field name="SELECT">objId</field>
          </block>
        </value>
        <value name="INPUT_1">
          <block type="text" id="28">
            <field name="TEXT">Opportunity</field>
          </block>
        </value>
      </block>
    </value>
  </block>
</xml>

flow.name: Approval
flow.BPMNXML:
<definitions targetNamespace="point.io" expressionLanguage="http://www.w3.org/1999/XPath" typeLanguage="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:omgdi="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:omgdc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:activiti="http://activiti.org/bpmn" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL">
  <message name="documentApprovalMsg" id="documentApprovalMsg"/>
  <message name="testquick" id="testquick"/>
  <message name="injectListJSON" id="injectListJSON"/>
  <collaboration id="Collaboration">
    <participant processRef="process_pool1" name="Pool" id="pool1"/>
  </collaboration>
  <process isExecutable="true" name="Approval" id="approval">
    <laneSet id="laneSet_process_pool1">
      <lane name="System" id="system">
        <flowNodeRef>start</flowNodeRef>
        <flowNodeRef>exclusivegateway3</flowNodeRef>
        <flowNodeRef>setOriginator</flowNodeRef>
        <flowNodeRef>servicetask1</flowNodeRef>
        <flowNodeRef>getToBeSelected</flowNodeRef>
        <flowNodeRef>addPartyServiceTask</flowNodeRef>
        <flowNodeRef>listToBeApproved</flowNodeRef>
        <flowNodeRef>mailtask1</flowNodeRef>
        <flowNodeRef>messagestartevent1</flowNodeRef>
        <flowNodeRef>exclusivegateway4</flowNodeRef>
      </lane>
      <lane name="Requestor" id="requestor">
        <flowNodeRef>addParties</flowNodeRef>
        <flowNodeRef>end</flowNodeRef>
        <flowNodeRef>end</flowNodeRef>
      </lane>
      <lane name="Approver" id="approver">
        <flowNodeRef>documentApprovalTrigger</flowNodeRef>
        <flowNodeRef>ApproveReject</flowNodeRef>
        <flowNodeRef>inclusivegateway1</flowNodeRef>
      </lane>
    </laneSet>
    <startEvent activiti:formKey="wf:submitReviewTask" name="Start Review" id="start"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="exclusivegateway3" sourceRef="start" id="flow1"/>
    <exclusiveGateway name="Exclusive Gateway" id="exclusivegateway3"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="setOriginator" sourceRef="exclusivegateway3" id="flow34">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${wf_currentAssignee == ""}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="servicetask1" sourceRef="exclusivegateway3" id="flow36"/>
    <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.wf_Loop_Role" name="Set Originator" id="setOriginator">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="roleName">
          <activiti:string>"Originator"</activiti:string>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="getToBeSelected" sourceRef="setOriginator" id="flow32"/>
    <serviceTask activiti:expression="#{execution.setVariable("Originator_LIST", wf_currentAssignee)} #{execution.setVariable("Originator_COUNT", 1)} #{execution.setVariable("Originator_LOOP", 0)}" name="Set First Assignee" id="servicetask1"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="getToBeSelected" sourceRef="servicetask1" id="flow37"/>
    <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.facts" name="To-Be Selected" id="getToBeSelected">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
          <activiti:string>poi_listtobe_fact</activiti:string>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
          <activiti:expression>${listMap}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="addParties" sourceRef="getToBeSelected" id="flow47"/>
    <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.wf_Add_Parties" name="Set Parties Manual" id="addPartyServiceTask"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="addParties" sourceRef="exclusivegateway4" name="add more" id="flow30">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${wf_optionsOutcome == "addmore"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="end" sourceRef="exclusivegateway4" name="cancel" id="flow31">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${wf_optionsOutcome == "cancel"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="listToBeApproved" sourceRef="exclusivegateway4" name="continue" id="flow38"/>
    <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.facts" name="To-Be Approved" id="listToBeApproved">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
          <activiti:string>poi_gettobe_fact</activiti:string>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
          <activiti:expression>${getMap}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="ApproveReject" sourceRef="listToBeApproved" id="flow51"/>
    <serviceTask activiti:type="mail" name="Notify Final" id="mailtask1">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="to">
          <activiti:expression>${Respondee_LIST}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="from">
          <activiti:string>alert@point.io</activiti:string>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="subject">
          <activiti:expression>You are being notified that the Process ${execution.getProcessInstanceId()} has completed.</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="html">
          <activiti:expression><p>Process ${execution.getProcessInstanceId()} started by ${Originator_LIST} has completed.</p>
<p>
<table>
<tr><td>Approvers:</td><td>${Approver_LIST}</td></tr>
<tr><td>CC:</td><td>${Originator_LIST}</td></tr>
</table>
</p></activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="cc">
          <activiti:expression>${Originator_LIST}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="end" sourceRef="mailtask1" id="flow26"/>
    <startEvent name="Message start" id="messagestartevent1">
      <messageEventDefinition messageRef="testquick"/>
    </startEvent>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="mailtask1" sourceRef="messagestartevent1" id="flow46"/>
    <startEvent name="documentApprovalTrigger" id="documentApprovalTrigger">
      <messageEventDefinition messageRef="documentApprovalMsg"/>
    </startEvent>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="ApproveReject" sourceRef="documentApprovalTrigger" id="flow44"/>
    <subProcess name="ApproveReject" id="ApproveReject">
      <multiInstanceLoopCharacteristics activiti:elementVariable="assignee" activiti:collection="Approver_LIST_COL" isSequential="false"/>
      <userTask activiti:formKey="poi_review_form" activiti:assignee="${assignee}" name="Review Request" id="review">
        <documentation>Review associated documentation and Approve/Reject.</documentation>
        <extensionElements>
          <activiti:formProperty required="true" type="enum" name="Options" id="wf_optionsOutcome">
            <activiti:value name="Approve" id="approve"/>
            <activiti:value name="Reject" id="reject"/>
          </activiti:formProperty>
        </extensionElements>
      </userTask>
      <sequenceFlow targetRef="reviewDecision" sourceRef="review" id="flow27"/>
      <exclusiveGateway name="Approve or Reject?" id="reviewDecision"/>
      <sequenceFlow targetRef="approveMail" sourceRef="reviewDecision" name="approved" id="flowapprove">
        <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${wf_optionsOutcome == 'approve'}</conditionExpression>
      </sequenceFlow>
      <sequenceFlow targetRef="selectReason" sourceRef="reviewDecision" name="rejected" id="flowreject">
        <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${wf_optionsOutcome == 'reject'}</conditionExpression>
      </sequenceFlow>
      <serviceTask activiti:type="mail" name="Approved Mail" id="approveMail">
        <extensionElements>
          <activiti:field name="to">
            <activiti:expression>${Originator_LIST}</activiti:expression>
          </activiti:field>
          <activiti:field name="from">
            <activiti:string>alert@point.io</activiti:string>
          </activiti:field>
          <activiti:field name="subject">
            <activiti:expression>Request ${execution.getProcessInstanceId()} is Approved!</activiti:expression>
          </activiti:field>
          <activiti:field name="html">
            <activiti:expression>Your request id ${execution.getProcessInstanceId()} has been reviewed and approved by ${assignee}.</activiti:expression>
          </activiti:field>
        </extensionElements>
      </serviceTask>
      <userTask activiti:formKey="poi_reject_form" activiti:assignee="${assignee}" name="Select Failure Reason" id="selectReason">
        <documentation>Select reason for Rejection.</documentation>
        <extensionElements>
          <activiti:formProperty required="true" type="enum" name="Rejection Reason" id="wf_optionsOutcome">
            <activiti:value name="Out of Policy" id="outofpolicy"/>
            <activiti:value name="Duplicate Request" id="duplicate"/>
            <activiti:value name="Invalid Request" id="invalid"/>
            <activiti:value name="Other" id="other"/>
          </activiti:formProperty>
        </extensionElements>
      </userTask>
      <serviceTask activiti:type="mail" name="Rejected Mail" id="rejectMail">
        <extensionElements>
          <activiti:field name="to">
            <activiti:expression>${Originator_LIST}</activiti:expression>
          </activiti:field>
          <activiti:field name="from">
            <activiti:string>alert@point.io</activiti:string>
          </activiti:field>
          <activiti:field name="subject">
            <activiti:expression>Request ${execution.getProcessInstanceId()} Rejected</activiti:expression>
          </activiti:field>
          <activiti:field name="html">
            <activiti:expression>Your request id ${execution.getProcessInstanceId()} has been reviewed and rejected by ${assignee}.</activiti:expression>
          </activiti:field>
        </extensionElements>
      </serviceTask>
      <endEvent name="End SubFlow Review" id="endevent1"/>
      <sequenceFlow targetRef="endevent1" sourceRef="approveMail" id="flow39"/>
      <sequenceFlow targetRef="endevent1" sourceRef="rejectMail" id="flow40"/>
      <startEvent name="Start SubFlow Review" id="startevent1"/>
      <sequenceFlow targetRef="review" sourceRef="startevent1" id="flow45"/>
      <sequenceFlow targetRef="rejectMail" sourceRef="selectReason" id="flow52"/>
    </subProcess>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="inclusivegateway1" sourceRef="ApproveReject" id="flow41"/>
    <inclusiveGateway name="Inclusive Gateway" id="inclusivegateway1"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="mailtask1" sourceRef="inclusivegateway1" id="flow42"/>
    <userTask activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" name="Select Parties &  Records" id="addParties">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:formProperty type="enum" name="Party 1 Role" id="party1_role">
          <activiti:value name="Approver" id="Approver"/>
          <activiti:value name="Respondee" id="Respondee"/>
        </activiti:formProperty>
        <activiti:formProperty type="string" name="Party 1 Email" id="party1_email"/>
        <activiti:formProperty type="enum" name="Party 2 Role" id="party2_role">
          <activiti:value name="Approver" id="Approver"/>
          <activiti:value name="Respondee" id="Respondee"/>
        </activiti:formProperty>
        <activiti:formProperty type="string" name="Party 2 Email" id="party2_email"/>
        <activiti:formProperty type="enum" name="Party 3 Role" id="party3_role">
          <activiti:value name="Approver" id="Approver"/>
          <activiti:value name="Respondee" id="Respondee"/>
        </activiti:formProperty>
        <activiti:formProperty type="string" name="Party 3 Email" id="party3_email"/>
        <activiti:formProperty required="true" type="enum" name="Option Selection" id="wf_optionsOutcome">
          <activiti:value name="Continue" id="continue"/>
          <activiti:value name="Add More Parties" id="addmore"/>
          <activiti:value name="Cancel" id="cancel"/>
        </activiti:formProperty>
      </extensionElements>
    </userTask>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="addPartyServiceTask" sourceRef="addParties" id="flow28"/>
    <endEvent name="End Review" id="end"/>
    <exclusiveGateway name="Exclusive Gateway" id="exclusivegateway4"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="exclusivegateway4" sourceRef="addPartyServiceTask" id="flow53"/>
    <boundaryEvent cancelActivity="false" attachedToRef="addParties" name="Message" id="addPartiesMessage">
      <messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/>
    </boundaryEvent>
  </process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagram_Collaboration">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlane_Collaboration" bpmnElement="Collaboration">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_pool1" bpmnElement="pool1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="-240.0" x="40.0" width="1051.0" height="731.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_system" bpmnElement="system">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="-250.0" x="60.0" width="1031.0" height="263.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_requestor" bpmnElement="requestor">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="12.0" x="60.0" width="1031.0" height="144.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_approver" bpmnElement="approver">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="155.0" x="60.0" width="1031.0" height="325.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_start" bpmnElement="start">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="-170.0" x="90.0" width="35.0" height="35.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_addParties" bpmnElement="addParties">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="61.0" x="400.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_end" bpmnElement="end">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="-190.0" x="935.0" width="35.0" height="35.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_documentApprovalTrigger" bpmnElement="documentApprovalTrigger">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="301.0" x="110.0" width="35.0" height="35.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_addPartyServiceTask" bpmnElement="addPartyServiceTask">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="-140.0" x="530.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_setOriginator" bpmnElement="setOriginator">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="-224.0" x="240.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_exclusivegateway3" bpmnElement="exclusivegateway3">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="-173.0" x="150.0" width="40.0" height="40.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_servicetask1" bpmnElement="servicetask1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="-140.0" x="240.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_ApproveReject" bpmnElement="ApproveReject">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="194.0" x="190.0" width="686.0" height="249.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_review" bpmnElement="review">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="274.0" x="285.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_reviewDecision" bpmnElement="reviewDecision">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="281.0" x="415.0" width="40.0" height="40.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_approveMail" bpmnElement="approveMail">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="220.0" x="478.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_selectReason" bpmnElement="selectReason">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="326.0" x="478.0" width="105.0" height="59.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_rejectMail" bpmnElement="rejectMail">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="328.0" x="635.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_endevent1" bpmnElement="endevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="338.0" x="805.0" width="35.0" height="35.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_startevent1" bpmnElement="startevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="284.0" x="215.0" width="35.0" height="35.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_mailtask1" bpmnElement="mailtask1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="-70.0" x="900.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_inclusivegateway1" bpmnElement="inclusivegateway1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="298.0" x="930.0" width="40.0" height="40.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_messagestartevent1" bpmnElement="messagestartevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="-60.0" x="830.0" width="35.0" height="35.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_getToBeSelected" bpmnElement="getToBeSelected">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="-180.0" x="400.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_listToBeApproved" bpmnElement="listToBeApproved">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="-140.0" x="750.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_exclusivegateway4" bpmnElement="exclusivegateway4">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="-133.0" x="660.0" width="40.0" height="40.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow1" bpmnElement="flow1">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="-153.0" x="125.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="-153.0" x="150.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow28" bpmnElement="flow28">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="61.0" x="452.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="29.0" x="493.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="-85.0" x="582.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow30" bpmnElement="flow30">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="-93.0" x="680.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="88.0" x="679.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="88.0" x="505.0"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds y="-123.0" x="650.0" width="100.0" height="12.0"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow31" bpmnElement="flow31">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="-133.0" x="680.0"/>

        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds y="-439.0" x="726.0" width="100.0" height="12.0"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow32" bpmnElement="flow32">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="-197.0" x="345.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="-196.0" x="378.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="-152.0" x="378.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="-153.0" x="400.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow34" bpmnElement="flow34">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="-173.0" x="170.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="-193.0" x="199.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="-197.0" x="240.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow36" bpmnElement="flow36">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="-133.0" x="170.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="-112.0" x="198.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="-113.0" x="240.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow37" bpmnElement="flow37">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="-113.0" x="345.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="-112.0" x="383.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="-128.0" x="383.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="-151.0" x="383.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="-153.0" x="400.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow27" bpmnElement="flow27">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="301.0" x="390.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="301.0" x="415.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flowapprove" bpmnElement="flowapprove">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="281.0" x="435.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="254.0" x="435.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="247.0" x="478.0"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds y="399.0" x="585.0" width="100.0" height="12.0"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flowreject" bpmnElement="flowreject">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="321.0" x="435.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="360.0" x="434.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="355.0" x="478.0"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds y="571.0" x="591.0" width="100.0" height="12.0"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow39" bpmnElement="flow39">
